list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a currently circulating story or report of uncertain or doubtful truth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were investigating rumors of a massacre
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đang điều tra những tin đồn về một vụ thảm sát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be circulated as an unverified account.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's rumored that he lives on a houseboat
